name: GuardSight
overview:
Easy To Use Security Services

GuardSight provides easy to use cloud based computer security services for businesses and individuals. Send us your computer intelligence (logs) and we’ll correlate that and provide you information products that can be used to safeguard your assets and reputation against online threats.

What Do We Offer?

  • Threat Management - Actionable and meaningful threat alerts and notifications
  • Compliance - Tools for demonstrating conformity with company and regulatory agency policies
  • Analytics - Views across multiple vectors
  • Risk Scoring - Security posture assessment system
  • Community - Instant access to subject matter experts in the field of computer security
